transcript:
Customer: Hello namaste, hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir, swayam exports se bol raha hu.
Customer: Haan haan ji sir.
Executive: Sir usme app pe to verify ho gaya hai mera.
Customer: Achha achha, ho gaya na verify app se.
Customer: Laptop pe jab kar raha hu to OTP nahi aa raha.
Executive: To matlab aap ye bol rahe hai ki laptop pe aap jab apne verify kiya to OTP aa gaya aapka?
Customer: Laptop pe nahi app pe kiya hai.
Executive: Sahi baat hai, wahi mai puch raha hu.
Executive: Sir agar app me aapne login kiya to aapke mobile pe OTP aa gaya aur aapne verify kar liya, login kar liya?
Customer: Mobile pe OTP aaya tha to wo jo hai usme aaya tha niche jab wo verify ka aate hai to wahi humne copy paste kar diya tha.
Executive: Haan paste kar diya tha, matlab aaya tha na aapke paas OTP aaya tha na aapke paas?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan thik hai, abhi kya kare ki ab jab laptop laptop pe nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Laptop pe nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Achha laptop pe nahi aa raha hai matlab, aapne try kar liya?
Customer: Mai kar hi raha hu, do teen baar kar chuka hu.
Executive: Ek ek minute, ab kya rakhiega, mai kya problem aa raha hai, is system pe hai na?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ek minute aap chalu rakhiye, chalu rakhiye.
Customer: Mail id hai sir aapke paas, login hai system me?
Customer: Mail sab pe hai, mail id hai.
Executive: Mail id login hai aapke system me abhi?
Customer: Haan mail id bhi login hai, sab login hai.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai, system me login hai thik hai, ek minute.
Customer: Mail id bhi verify kar li usse bhi password aaya tha wo bhi daal diya, mail id verify ho gayi hai, ye sab ho gaya.
Executive: Chalo thik hai thik hai, jo hamara laptop hai uspe nahi ho raha.
Executive: Thik hai, ek Deepak Kumar IndiaMART ke naam se ek mil gaya hoga, check kijiyega.
Customer: Ek minute.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Mail id aaya na sir, premyadav@live.com.
Customer: Mail aa gaya aapka.
Executive: Haan uspe likha hoga sir join with Google meet, usse join kijiyega.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Waha pe likha hoga sir join with Google meet, aap system se join kijiyega.
Customer: Hmm thik hai.
Customer: Join video meet with IndiaMART haan.
Executive: Haan ji ji.
Customer: Ek minute join with Google meet.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan sir aap join now kijiyega sir likha hoga join now.
Customer: Ask to join join kispe karu ask to join.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Abhi join ho gaye sir?
Customer: Haan thik hai, abhi kya ho raha hai sir niche dekhiye ek arrow ka symbol aa raha hoga niche me.
Customer: Isme arrow ka symbol kis me aa raha hai?
Executive: Niche ke side me, sabse niche ke side dekhiye thoda sa arrow bana hoga, jisme likha hoga share a screen.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Uspe click kijiye, click kiye, kar diya.
Executive: Click karne ke baad sir sabse top pe dekhiye likha hoga entire screen, teen option aa raha hoga chrome tab, window aur entire screen.
Customer: Entire screen ji.
Executive: Ispe click karne ke baad chota sa screen aa raha hoga sir, chota sa ispe click karke share kar dijiye.
Customer: Chota sa screen pe click kiya share kar diya.
Executive: Haan ji sir thik hai, kar liya na aapne.
Executive: Thik hai sir, aap mujhe dikhaiyega jo IndiaMART login kar rahe hai wo dikhaiyega mujhe.
Executive: Ek tab hai na IndiaMART ka ek tab open hai upar me uspe click kijiyega.
Customer: Hmm ek minute, wo to wo to export tab hai, haan uske bagal wala haan ispe click kijiye haan.
Customer: Ab ispe jo phone number pada hua hai mera aap dekh rahe hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Send kijiye.
Customer: Maine recent kiya OTP thik hai.
Executive: Haan recent kiya.
Customer: Ab OTP nahi aayega mere phone me.
Executive: Nahi aaya?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Chaliye, thik hai sir ek kaam kijiyega, isko cross kijiye, waha pe dekho teen dotted line hoga sabse upar me.
Executive: Right side me, right side ke sabse system me teen dotted line upar me right side me sabse upar me top pe dekhiye top pe.
Customer: Haan uspe click kijiye, haan click kijiye.
Executive: Waha pe sir likha hoga new incognito.
Customer: Karwa rahe hai, video meet hui hai wo aapka hai.
Executive: Uspe dekhiye sir likha hua hai incognito window, new incognito window.
Customer: Ek new incognito window ji, click kijiye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Click kiye?
Executive: Haan yaha pe aap IndiaMART type kijiyega seller.indiamart.com.
Customer: Seller.
Customer: Kar diya.
Customer: Kar diya, ab daliye phone number.
Executive: Haan daliye apna.
Customer: Ho raha hai sir kyuki aapke paas gaya hoga already mobile ek OTP gaya hoga aapke paas.
Executive: Nahi aaya sir, pehle gaya tha na isse pehle jo login kiye the aapne usse gaya tha aapke paas?
Customer: Wo aapke mobile me mobile aap jab download kiye the sir jab kiye the verify waha pe OTP gaya tha na aapke?
Customer: Haan, wo us time number daliye ga.
Customer: Wo wala OTP bhul gaye sir.
Executive: Wo sir aapke mobile app me gaya hoga sir.
Customer: Mobile app me hai nahi sir wo wo jab mai app kar raha tha download.
Executive: Haan haan, wo jab app me login kar raha tha to wo niche hi aa gaya tha OTP jaha pe daalte hai lekin ispe nahi aaya tha jo mobile app pe hai na.
Executive: Aap dekhiye na sir SMS me dekhiye na sir SMS me gaya hoga already likha hua hai ki we have already send OTP on your mobile, isliye apna SMS check kijiyega.
Customer: Ab dekhiye to SMS me jo aaya tha.
Executive: Haan haan, wo SMS ke niche jaha pe daalte hai na wo waha pe aaya tha wo humne copy paste kar diya tha lekin isme jo hai koi OTP IndiaMART ka nahi hai, total India ka hai.
Executive: Koi koi bhi to OTP gaya hoga na sir IndiaMART jab kiya hoga aapne to OTP to gaya hoga na koi bhi OTP.
Customer: Arey sir wo copy paste shayad kiya tha mujhe ab dhyan bhi nahi hai isme kahi nahi dikh raha hai OTP.
Executive: Ek OTP gaya hoga already, dobara kar de kya sir pura sign out karne ke baad me?
Customer: Saari device se mai log out karu ya laptop se log out karu all device?
Executive: Haan waha se kijiye koi dikkat nahi kijiye, wo bol raha hai ki already hum ek baar bhej chuke hai to dobara nahi bhejenge wo iska matlab ye karna hai ki ek baar hum jab OTP bheja hua hai dobara hum nahi bhejenge iska ye karna hai we have already send OTP on your mobile.
Customer: Nahi to isko setting me jaake mai isko all device kar du kya karu?
Customer: Hello, haan ji aage sir bataiye na.
Customer: Mai setting me jaau uski all device isme nahi aayega ispe ispe all device yaha pe option nahi aayega sir aa raha hai yaha pe kahi pe?
Customer: Sir nahi tha.
Customer: Ispe to nahi aayega jaha login ho na app pe login ho waha bhale hi aayega.
Executive: Nahi nahi hype pe kijiyega abhi click hype pe jaha aapne kiya tha hype.
Customer: Haan pe niche dekhiye likhega sign out from different user different user.
Customer: Kaha pe sir sign out.
Customer: Haan click kijiye, click kijiyega.
Customer: Ji, phone number maang raha hai.
Executive: Number daliye.
Customer: Daal diya sir, submit kar diya.
Customer: Fir wahi page khul gaya.
Executive: Wahi page open ho gaya kya?
Customer: 8960 716199, fir login kiya fir wahi system, koi password nahi aaya.
Executive: Koi password, nahi nahi wo nahi password nahi jayega wo likha hua already ki diya hua hai.
Customer: Nahi to usme aayega.
Executive: Ek ek kaam thik hai thik hai ek kaam karte hai jo aapne sign out kiya tha na.
Customer: Ji, haan ji sign out kiya tha na all devices wo kijiye mobile se.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Mobile me mai gaya, pehle setting pe jana padega.
Customer: Ek minute.
Customer: Setting sign out all device.
Customer: Kar diya sign out all device, ab isme isme message me aaya hai password ek wo daale kya isme?
Executive: Haan daliye password.
Customer: Daal diye send kijiye.
Customer: Haan ho gaya, ho gaya na.
Customer: Ji, open ho gaya na sir aapka, wahi bol raha tha aapka, ab aapka login ho gaya.
Customer: Ab ye ab ye system wala login ho gaya tab ye wala nahi ho raha hai app wala.
Customer: App wala nahi ho raha hai, wahi password humne isme dala jo phone wale me uspe nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Ab isme nahi ho raha hai aapka?
Customer: Nahi sir.
Customer: Keh raha hai enter correct password bol raha hai.
Executive: System se ho gaya system se nahi ho raha.
Executive: Aisa sambhav nahi hona chahiye, isi baat to ho jana chahiye tha.
Customer: Nahi sir isme ho gaya ab isme nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Ek baar fir se kare isko kaate kya kare, kisko, nahi isko usse fir se daliye ga matlab sign out kijiyega waha se.
Customer: Mai mai mai mai ja raha hu home pe ek minute, android shoes continue recent add, are latest, ab ye isme to already sign in hai app pe bhi, sign in ho gaya, app pe nahi mai back chala gaya tha na, haan haan, mai back chala gaya tha ispe app pe ab jo isme jo dikh rahe hai sahi hai sir same aa gaya hai isme jo by lead dikh raha tha na, wahi isme bhi dikhne laga wahi system pe bhi dikh raha hai wahi app pe bhi dikh raha hai, chaliye chaliye chaliye thik hai sir abhi abhi ho gaya aapka na, chaliye thik hai sir aapne ek toll free number se call kiya tha mujhe, ji, hello, haan to usse mai close kar raha hu sir matlab wo concern close kar de, ji sir ji sir, thik hai sir ek feedback ke liye ek message aayega sir mil jayega please uspe mera feedback de dijiyega, bahut important hota hai sir hamare liye, sure sure sure sure sure, yes sir thank you so much sir thank you, thank you, hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to login on laptop.

- OTP not received on laptop.



Resolution:

- Executive assisted customer in logging in.

- Customer logged in through mobile app.



Next Steps: 

- Executive requested feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- login, otp, laptop, mobile app, feedback
